creator: lubell@ecf.utoronto.ca
text:
Documentation Page "Authentication, Authorization and Access Control"

Under the section entitled "Letting More Than One Person In", it gives an 
example for adding "dpitts" to the password file as: 

htpasswd /usr/local/apache/passwd/password dpitts 

However, all other instances of the password file on the page 
are /usr/local/apache/passwd/passwords  so the above command example is missing 
an "s"

creator: kess@kess-net.de
text: This has been fixed. Thank you for your hint.
